title: Select Committee on Citywide Mandatory Affordable Housing (MHA) - District 1 - Public Hearing
description:
Briefing and Public Hearing on CB 119184: AN ORDINANCE relating to Mandatory Housing Affordability (MHA); rezoning certain land and modifying development standards throughout the City, implementing MHA requirements, and modifying existing development standards to improve livability. This hearing will focus on changes affecting property in District 1.
Meeting Location: Chief Sealth International High School (Auditorium), 2600 SW Thistle St., Seattle, WA 98126
